name: Blue Marlin Motel

reviews.text: We were able to get a room at the last minute for a good price. The pool was fantastic. The hotel is in a U shape with outdoor access to rooms. Parking and pool are in the middle. It looks as much of the hotel is recently updated. Very clean and comfortable. Great residental neighboorhood with small cafes, can walk to beach, should drive to Mallory Square, etc.
reviews.title: Value, pool, quiet neighborhood

likes.disliked: — Front desk needed lots of personal information

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Blue Marlin was a great place to stay. Spotless, quiet, comfortable - really nice bathroom - great location just off Duval street but away from the crowds.
reviews.title: great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Standard motel set up with 2 storey blocks arranged around a great pool. Room was clean and spacious with regular bathroom. Staff were helpful and directed us to excellent nearby Italian restaurant, local bike hire (highly recommended way to see around Key West) and on site laundry facilities.
reviews.title: Great Motel

reviews.text: We stayed there with our two kids and another family also with their two kids and really enjoyed our stay.
reviews.title: Very nice place to be especially with children

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are clean, quite large and comfortable.
reviews.title: nice affordable motel

reviews.text: This motel was one of the best places I have stayed in a long time. We were in Key West after planning a trip for a week at another resort on another key. When we arrived at that resort we were extremly disappointed with that resort, we canceled the reservation for the week. We happened to stay at the Blue Marlin a few nights before and called and asked if we could get two rooms for the entire week, not a problem. The rooms are spacious extremly clean and the folks working there are friendly and are there to please. I would highly recommend this motel. Its located a block from Duval and on the quite side of town. The beaches are close by (within walking or biking distance),but they have a great pool and poolside. Its a perfect Key West place to stay. We stayed the entire week there, with another family. We had 2 teenage girls and they really enjoyed the motel and the location. I would highly recommend The Blue Marlin if you plan on staying in Key West!!
reviews.title: Fantastic Place

likes.liked: — Friendly and very clean spacious rooms, great location

reviews.title: Great location!
reviews.text: This was our second time here, and am glad that nothing has changed! Rooms are large and clean, staff is extremely friendly. Pool is nice, we just park here and walk everywhere - being one block off Duval is perfect. 1/2 block down from here is Anna's market and the breakfast there is a habit. Good food on the porch with cuban coffee is the only way for us to start a day. This place is considered our KW home.

I was planning an epic adventure to the Keys by Harley and I needed an affordable place to stay once I got there. The blue marlin fit the bill to a tee. I pulled in late in the afternoon and promptly was greeted by the desk clerk as I dismounted my bike in front of the door. I talked with him a while as I checked in and he told me some local events I should check out and also told me I could park my bike in a spot where I could see it from my room. The room was very clean and large. It had two queen beds, double sink wet bar and a microwave fridge combo. They even thought to give a pack of microwave popcorn. It only cost them .50 cents to do this but I have been in very expensive hotels that didn't give me diddly! The morning breakfast was a well stocked counter of donuts, danishes, fruit, coffee, and juice. The even let me into the feast a little early since they already had it set up. This hotel is only about a block from the Southernost point marker. It is a good walk to get to mallory pier but its a walk full of sites to see and if your in a hurry in key west then your in the wrong place anyway!
reviews.title: Great affordable Place in the Keys

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a great place, very friendy, great pool, great location. It is a MOTEL!!! You cannot beat the price. Would stay there again, room was clean.
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay

reviews.text: The rooms have been upgraded, I have stayed there 3+ times over the last 3-4 years. This past New Year, we received a not so pleasant New Years welcome when we were refused late check out of any sort, and one of my friends rooms was barged in on and told the police had been called...aprox. :30 after they were to have been out (check out 11am). Now I realize that they were to have been out at check out time, but I don't think a one hour late check out is to much to ask, especially after you dropped over $300 bucks a night on a room for three nights... bottomline, next time I am down in KW for the New Year, I will stay else where. Also they tried to evict a couple girls for going in the pool after midnight, FYI.
reviews.title: not quite so hospitable around check out time...

likes.liked: — the pool during the day, pretty much don't get bothered for drinking at the pool.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Blue Marlin was a nice little motel for the price (around $105 a night). The room was a little older, but it was spacious and clean and had a newer TV; parking is free, and the air conditioner worked well. The pool is in the center of the parking lot, but was clean and well kept (not too much shade though). The motel is one block from Duval but near the Southernmost Point ( about a mile away from Mallory Square), so the area was quiet but not too quiet.
reviews.title: Nice for the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The beds were unusually noisy when sitting on them, but they were comfortable. We didn't notice any odd smells (mentioned by some other reviewer). The front desk clerk who checked us in and out was friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Blue Marlin was a great motel in Key West

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For the price, I would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Right Place, Right Price

likes.disliked: — Walking upstairs to my room with suitcases

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got this motel from a coupon book. We were only $109 per night which was quite reasonable for Key West.
reviews.title: Loved it with minor issues

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is in a great location - really near Duvall Street.
reviews.title: Horrible, smelly hotel, checked out next day as early as we could

likes.liked: — Location - close to duval street, the main drag, if that interests you

reviews.title: overall trip to keys
reviews.text: my husband and i stayed 2 nights and 3 days in key west. we had a wonderful time. we stayed at the blue marlin. it was about 100.00 per night . the room was very clean and nice. they have stopped smoking in the rooms and you can still smell the old smoke. we bought some air freshner and kept it sprayed and we made it just fine. the pool was clean and nice. the entire place was very clean and felt safe. we chose this area to be close to Duval St and be in the oldest part of the city. fantasy fest was going on so there was not a lot of vacancies anywhere. we checked 6 places before we found the blue marlin. we would stay there again. the trip was great. also we were told that there is no salad bar on this island, we did not find one anywhere. only place to get a steak is outback or a diner. we want to go back again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked 4 nights on the interent in advance for $89 a night. This was one of the cheapest motels we could find in Key West.
reviews.title: Very Good

reviews.text: We arrived and was pleasenly suprised, the room and bathroom was a good size. The air con was really powerful, the room very clean and bright and it had TV and fridge. The breakfast was small but tasty and coffee available all day was a god send.
reviews.title: HIGHLY Recommended

likes.disliked: — That it did not have carpets. It got extremely slippery when it got wet.

reviews.text: The pool was a good size and clean and there was plently of free parking.
reviews.title: If you are in a wheelchair avoid this place!!

likes.disliked: — A/C barely worked and no wheelchair accessability on property, office was even 3 steps up

reviews.text: Overall we had an excellent stay here and would definatly come back again. Don't be worried about the price being cheap this motel is a little gem.
reviews.title: loved It

description: Two-story Motel located 1 block from town center & 3 blocks from ocean.
